description: Returns a list of details about test cases for a report.

parameters.name: reportArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the report for which test cases are returned.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: A TestCaseFilter object used to filter the returned reports. status (string) --- The status used to filter test cases. A TestCaseFilter can have one status. Valid values are: SUCCEEDED FAILED ERROR SKIPPED UNKNOWN keyword (string) --- A keyword that is used to filter on the name or the prefix of the test cases. Only test cases where the keyword is a substring of the name or the prefix will be returned.

nested_params.name: status
nested_params.description: The status used to filter test cases. A TestCaseFilter can have one status. Valid values are:

nested_params.name: keyword
nested_params.description: A keyword that is used to filter on the name or the prefix of the test cases. Only test cases where the keyword is a substring of the name or the prefix will be returned.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: During a previous call, the maximum number of items that can be returned is the value specified in maxResults. If there more items in the list, then a unique string called a nextToken is returned. To get the next batch of items in the list, call this operation again, adding the next token to the call. To get all of the items in the list, keep calling this operation with each subsequent next token that is returned, until no more next tokens are returned.

nested_items.name: testCases
nested_items.description: The returned list of test cases.

nested_items.name: reportArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the report to which the test case belongs.

nested_items.name: testRawDataPath
nested_items.description: The path to the raw data file that contains the test result.

nested_items.name: prefix
nested_items.description: A string that is applied to a series of related test cases. CodeBuild generates the prefix. The prefix depends on the framework used to generate the tests.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the test case.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status returned by the test case after it was run. Valid statuses are SUCCEEDED, FAILED, ERROR, SKIPPED, and UNKNOWN.

nested_items.name: durationInNanoSeconds
nested_items.description: The number of nanoseconds it took to run this test case.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: A message associated with a test case. For example, an error message or stack trace.

nested_items.name: expired
nested_items.description: The date and time a test case expires. A test case expires 30 days after it is created. An expired test case is not available to view in CodeBuild.

nested_items.name: testSuiteName
nested_items.description: The name of the test suite that the test case is a part of.
